article_title: Union made counteroffer on pensions to save Trump Taj Mahal casino
article_text:
Trump Taj Mahal Trump Taj Mahal Casino in Atlantic City Thursday, Sept 4, 2014.

Local 54 Casino workers gather for a protest Wednesday in Atlantic City.

Local54 3.jpg

Local 54 2.jpg Atlantic City Police Lt. James Sarkos warns UNITE-HERE Local 54 protesters they are breaking the law by obstructing a public passage.

Local54 5.jpg

Local54 4.jpg

54 PROTEST Local 54 members get arrested during the protest at intersection of Arctic Ave and Christopher Columbus Blvd and the Expressway an alleged attempt by "the industry" to take away members' healthcare Wednesday, Oct 8, 2014. The event is styled as a celebration of the 10-year anniversary of a strike over healthcare.

54 PROTEST Local 54 President Bob McDevitt get arrested during the protest at intersection of Arctic Ave and Christopher Columbus Blvd and the Expressway an alleged attempt by "the industry" to take away members' healthcare Wednesday, Oct 8, 2014. The event is styled as a celebration of the 10-year anniversary of a strike over healthcare.

54 PROTEST Local 54 President Bob McDevitt right get arrested during the protest at intersection of Arctic Ave and Christopher Columbus Blvd and the Expressway an alleged attempt by "the industry" to take away members' healthcare Wednesday, Oct 8, 2014. The event is styled as a celebration of the 10-year anniversary of a strike over healthcare.

og.description: Local 54 of UNITE-HERE offered Sept. 26 to accept reduced pension contributions for its Trump Taj Mahal workers, according to a Tuesday filing by the casino workers union in federal bankruptcy court in Wilmington, Delaware.
og.title: Union made counteroffer on pensions to save Trump Taj Mahal casino

article_metadata.description: Local 54 of UNITE-HERE offered Sept. 26 to accept reduced pension contributions for its Trump Taj Mahal workers, according to a Tuesday filing by the casino workers union in federal bankruptcy court in Wilmington, Delaware.
